text: Ane te loko temam ciso padase, ke he amara palanahara! Amane kadhi le, ame sara karyo karisum, te karyo sivaya-je ame karata hata, (allaha kahese) sum ame tamane etali vaya nahati api ke je samajava icchato, te samaji jata ane tamari pase saceta karanara pana avya, to have svada cakho ke atyacari'oni madada karanara ko'i nathi
